name: Tower Breaker - Hack & Slash
description:
Conquer all the towers!

Be a Devil and conquer all the towers.

Dash! Defense! Attack! Blow the enemy!
A Simple and Funny Action Game "Tower Breaker"


Cool Things
◆ Gather the best weapons and strengthen them with 100% chance!
◆ Gather your cool armors and shields!
◆ Gather the pet that helps you grow and upgrade!
◆ Use each unique weapon's fancy skills!
◆ Eliminate every towers' characterized enemies and powerful bosses!
